A campanha é bem rápida, mas foi o suficiente pra eu odiar a GLaDOS. 
O jogo tem uma proposta simples mas é bastante divertido, apesar de me dar dor de cabeça pensar tanto em como resolver certos puzzles.

久仰的作品portal.这一次高考完沉浸下来慢慢的在2天内通了关,虽然有评论说1个多小时流程但我打了3个多小时(可能我脑子不好使吧),作品的新意放在现在仍然是罕见的,枯燥无味在作品下我在游玩过程中并不会感受到,相反一次次光圈科技的全新用法让我倍感新奇,才让我感受到了这款游戏的趣味性十足,就是有点晕开始.
Jogo muito bom e com um senso de humor melhor ainda, é um jogo meio antigo porém muito inovador até os dias de hoje, é um jogo muito bom. Recomendo

Es un juego de puzzles con mecanicas inovadoras, aparte de algunos chistes jocosos de la maquina no hay mucho mas para decir, sienta las bases para portal 2. Que ancioso muy pronto lo jugare para ver como se desarrolla y finaliza esta historia que tantas incognitas nos dejo...
Sí.

I got this game just because i played the second one and well in all fairness this one isn't bad. It's a lot shorter than the first second one but at least gives some good story to it. You do have bonus Maps and time trials which make up for it. And I believe downloadable levels too so you can get more out of it. But I'd say grab both at the same time that way once you finish the first you have more to play later or right after the first. Plus you can also find where that Default Gmod music comes from which is nice!
love this game, worth the 1 doller
portal gun go pow pow

If you wanted a game to challenge yourself, to see not only how smart you are but how skilled you are, and you don't want it too expensive, you have come to the right place. Whether your here for the story or your here for the challenges, I promise that you won't regret it. From -10 to 0 to 10, a 9/10 only seems fitting.
I never had access to this game growing up, but playing it was a much better experience than i would've imagined.

Неплохая головоломка от Valve. Проходится за один забег жалко что так коротко, сюжета маловато но он есть. Хорошо бы пройти перед шедевральной второй частью. попотеть заставят усложнённые уровни и сбор приёмников для ачивки, благо есть сейв упрощающий это дело. По итогу могу сказать что для меня первая часть Portal приквел нежели оригинал но от этого хуже он не становится.
Picked this game back up, still a good fun and interesting plot to keep the mind at wonder.

I made a new account so I could make another positive review
Good

Apparently, this amazing, iconic puzzle game manages to escape my notice all these years...granted, I don't have a Steam Account back then.

Anyway, you who read this might be wondering how did this game finally caught my notice. Put it simply, I fell into the bottomless pit of V-Tubers after seeing some of them playing Portal 2. I swear, YouTube recommendation can be really wild sometimes. In any case, that looks fun, I thought, so why not try it? Not to mention, I bought this when the Portal Bundle was on discount. Put two and two together, and you got an incredibly silly reason.

My conclusion? I wish I actually paid attention in physics class. How did I ever got through high school...

I might play Portal 2 soon enough, we'll see.

An outstanding puzzle game with challenging levels, and good mechanics in general.
Unfortunately is a kind of short game, at least its campaign is about 2 hours to complete, if you start the game and know how the gravity and the portals work.
The challenge mode that is kind of nice either, as the name suggests, even I with 18 hours playing Portal 2 and 1 thought it was a considerably hard handful of maps.

You've probably seen this game before, but never really looked into it either because you don't like platformers, puzzles, or shooters. But trust me, this is the sort of game anybody could enjoy! It's got great humor, innovative mechanics, and excellent level design, dangerous enemies, treacherous environments, and a devious villain. The game only takes around 4 hours to play to completion, plus some bonus levels, so there isn't much , but what there is is great. Would entirely recommend, one of the best games out there.

Also, the cake is a lie!

Love this game! (The cake is a lie!)

三小时通关
一，比较晕玩的时候，难受的一批
二，对话没有汉语翻译，完全不知道在说什么
三，最后一关，画风突变，游戏时长顶好几关，虽然有趣，但是在难受的情况下，难受的一批。
最后，游戏很有趣，在晕的情况下玩通关，所以不推荐打两次，通关就行，真晕，搞得我胃疼。
推荐打折入，游戏确实很有趣，这是真的没错。
DIESES SPIEL IST ZU GUT für diese 20 euro es hat mir immer sehr viel spass gemacht

Nach drei Stunden habe ich Portal erstmals durchgespielt. Dabei habe ich jedoch nur ein Drittel der Errungenschaften eingesammelt, allein daher hat das Spiel für mich einen Wiederspielwert. Außerdem ist der Abspann einer der BESTEN, die ich nach einem Spielerlebnis gezeigt bekam - oder in diesem Fall zu hören!
